main event: A commercial airline pilot reported seeing a saucer-shaped object over Bradford, Illinois on March 18, 1950.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be traveling at a speed of 200 mph.,The object's flight path was to the southeast.,It was observed at an estimated altitude of 6,000 ft.,The duration of the observation was approximately 5 minutes.,The pilot reported the sighting to a radio station, which relayed the information to the Air Intelligence Service Center.
